name: ListAllBrands
description:
Retrieve all brands within your organization.

Use this tool to get a comprehensive list of all the brands associated with your organization using Okta.

parameters.name: include_additional_metadata
parameters.description: Specifies additional metadata to be included in the response. Provide a list of metadata fields to expand.

value_schema.description: Specifies additional metadata to be included in the response

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor for pagination. It is an opaque string obtained from the `Link` response header to specify your current location in the brand list.

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: object_limit
parameters.description: Sets an upper limit on the number of brand objects to return in the response. Accepts an integer value.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: Search string to filter the brand records for matching values.

value_schema.description: Searches the records for matching value

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Specifies additional metadata to be included in the response

value_schema.description: Specifies additional metadata to be included in the response

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Searches the records for matching value

value_schema.description: Searches the records for matching value

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
